001package org.consensusj.rx.jsonrpc;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
005import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AsyncSupport;
006import org.slf4j.Logger;
007import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
008
009import java.io.IOError;
010import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
011import java.util.function.Supplier;
012
013/**
014 * RxJava support for calling JSON-RPC clients.
015 */
016public interface RxJsonRpcClient extends AsyncSupport {
017    Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RxJsonRpcClient.class);
018
019    /**
020     * Return a <i>cold</i> {@link Single} for calling a provided <b>synchronous</b> JSON-RPC method.
021     * <p>
022     *  A  <i>cold</i> stream does not begin processing until someone subscribes to it.
023     * @param method A {@link org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AsyncSupport.ThrowingSupplier} wrapper for a method call.
024     * @param <RSLT> The type of the expected result
025     * @return A <i>cold</i> {@link Single} for calling the method.
026     */
027    default <RSLT> Single<RSLT> call(AsyncSupport.ThrowingSupplier<RSLT> method) {
028        return Single.defer(() -> Single.fromCompletionStage(supplyAsync(method)));
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * Return a <i>cold</i> {@link Single} for calling a provided <b>asynchronous</b> JSON-RPC method.
033     * (Uses a supplier to make sure the async call isn't made until subscription time)
034     * <p>
035     *  A  <i>cold</i> stream does not begin processing until someone subscribes to it.
036     * @param supplier of completable
037     * @param <RSLT> The type of the expected result
038     * @return A <i>cold</i> {@link Single} for calling the method.
039     */
040    default <RSLT> Single<RSLT> defer(Supplier<CompletionStage<RSLT>> supplier) {
041        return Single.defer(() -> Single.fromCompletionStage(supplier.get()));
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * Poll a method, ignoring {@link IOError}.
046     * The returned {@link Maybe} will:
047     * <ol>
048     *     <li>Emit a value if successful</li>
049     *     <li>Empty Complete on IOError</li>
050     *     <li>Error out if any other Exception occurs</li>
051     * </ol>
052     *
053     * @param method A supplier (should be an RPC Method) that can throw {@link Exception}.
054     * @param <RSLT> The type of the expected result
055     * @return A Maybe for the expected result type
056     */
057    default <RSLT> Maybe<RSLT> pollOnce(AsyncSupport.ThrowingSupplier<RSLT> method) {
058        return call(method)
059                .doOnSuccess(this::logSuccess)
060                .doOnError(this::logError)
061                .toMaybe()
062                .onErrorComplete(this::isTransientError);    // Empty completion if IOError
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * Determine if error is transient and should be ignored
067     *
068     * TODO: Ignoring all IOError is too broad
069     * 
070     * @param t Error thrown from calling an RPC method
071     * @return true if the error is transient and can be ignored
072     */
073    default boolean isTransientError(Throwable t) {
074        return t instanceof IOError;
075    }
076    
077    private <RSLT> void logSuccess(RSLT result) {
078        log.debug("RPC call returned: {}", result);
079    }
080
081    private void logError(Throwable throwable) {
082        log.error("Exception in RPCCall", throwable);
083    }
084}
